mapper.insert: insert into comment (writer, post_id, content) values(#{writer}, #{postId}, #{content})
mapper.select: select c.writer, c.mod_at, c.content , c.reg_at, u.avatar from comment c left join user u on c.writer = u.email where post_id = #{postId} order by reg_at desc
mapper.update: update comment set post_id = #{postId}, content = #{content}, mod_at = now() where email = #{email}
